body: Hi Roy, Sure. It's very easy. Find Honeybee_Update Honeybee component. It is in tab 12. Once you have that component on canvas, do the following. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/8kkt4Vvp7GwTSagKL48fBD2zjHZ9rssDMgTdToUaGrqgkoCSAvcQcJ9pacgk7VHA3eI9VVXty80h5U7B*60XntYYVRoAwhsO/ScreenClip.png)It will take a few seconds to update your components. You can also update all the Honeybee objects ( the ones you don't have on canvas as well) by attaching a boolean toggle to _updateAllUobjects. To update Ladybug, the process is quite similar. For that you use Ladybug_Update Ladybug found in tab 6. -Devang
